attributes.action: Save the BBC program Top Gear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the comments that the Top Gear program may not return, we petition the PM to save the only program on the BBC worth watching.
We don’t want any more dross celebrity shows or soap operas we want entertainment that Top Gear gives in large quantities.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
